Articles.Content:
SU-37 Flanker-F

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/gPIoa)

Forget about semplicity and functionality, this is a 100% precise replica (except the cockpit) of a sukhoi 37.

SPECS

-parts: 252

-fuel load: 1400 lt

-speed: mach 1 at sea level, mach 3 at altitude

-manouverability: exceptional agility that requires skills

-weight: 28 tons

-length:19.4m

-width:12.9m

-height 5.5m

CONTROLS

-1 toggle engines

-0 toggle hidden ladder

WARNING

Before fly select the Probodobodyne OKTO2 clipped inside the nosecone and click: "control from here" this will setup a better artificial horizon. 

Look this picture

![sjCLSoQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/sjCLSoQ.png)

[DOWNLOAD](http://www./download/l3ph07qzhf2xaps/Su-37_By_Eorin_1_0.craft)

The new aero parts allow for prettier flanker replicas. However, it also allows a certain other jet to be replicated.

Time to get cracking on my secret replica... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> The new aero parts allow for prettier flanker replicas. However, it also allows a certain other jet to be replicated.
> Time to get cracking on my secret replica... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

the ncs adapter and the new canards fits a lot into flanker design

![uTxNSNu.png](http://i.imgur.com/uTxNSNu.png)

made a [SU-21](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suchoi_S-21#/media/File:Sukhoi_Gulfstream_S-21.jpg) V.I.K. (very important kerbal) carrier of it .. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

[craft](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B77tTCv1DutXWkR1dTlWaEE3VWs/view?usp=sharing) file

tend to disintegrate (~970m/s) needs more ....

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T21:10:52Z" title="04/30/2015 09:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by dark Jim**

> 
> made a SU-21 V.I.K. (very important kerbal) carrier of it .. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
> 
> [craft](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B77tTCv1DutXWkR1dTlWaEE3VWs/view?usp=sharing) file
> 
> tend to disintegrate (~970m/s) needs more ....

So sweet. I made one with B9 and Pwings back before these new spaceplane parts. So cool you can build it without mods now.

![5OfQ0bV.png](http://i.imgur.com/5OfQ0bV.png)

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/uTxNSNu.png](http://i.imgur.com/uTxNSNu.png)
> made a [SU-21](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suchoi_S-21#/media/File:Sukhoi_Gulfstream_S-21.jpg) V.I.K. (very important kerbal) carrier of it .. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> [craft](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B77tTCv1DutXWkR1dTlWaEE3VWs/view?usp=sharing) file
> 
> tend to disintegrate (~970m/s) needs more ....

I've just try it, you used my su-37 fuselage right? seems identical, don't worry im happy if you did so ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) it's an awesome modification imho.
Nice! Also, how do you embed an imgur album? I tried putting the album link between [noparse][imgur][/imgur][/noparse] but it never works!
You do that imgur /imgur but with the last section of this link [http://imgur.com/a/IcxYN](http://imgur.com/a/IcxYN). So you would do {imgur}IcxYN{/imgur} (with square brackets).
I am IN LOVE with the maneuverability of this ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Cheesus
